cement.description: The amount of cement used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

slag.description: The amount of slag used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

flyash.description: The amount of fly ash used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

water.description: The amount of water used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

superplasticizer.description: The amount of superplasticizer used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

coarseaggregate.description: The amount of coarse aggregate used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

fineaggregate.description: The amount of fine aggregate used in the concrete mix (in kg/m^3)

age.description: The age of the concrete (in days) at which the strength is tested

csMPa.description: The compressive strength of the concrete (in Mega Pascals)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in concrete composition analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the composition and age of the concrete, please predict the concrete strength (csMPa).
prompt.answer_prompt: The concrete strength (csMPa) is predicted to be __.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in concrete composition analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the composition of the concrete, please predict the age of the concrete.
prompt.answer_prompt: The age of the concrete is predicted to be __ days.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in concrete composition analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the other components and age of the concrete, please predict the amount of water used in the mix.
prompt.answer_prompt: The amount of water used in the mix is predicted to be __.
